Locked up! No! Piece of slag, don't you dare!

Reflexive mechanisms took ho=
ld of Creep. Her core consciousness was
out... for the moment. For now, she=
 acted!

She woke up and started looking rapidly for a way to push back the=

closing door. Panicked, she help up her hand and transformed it so
that it=
 became like a hundred dentist's drills. She started working on
the hinges =
until the door fell and looked around, not in control anymore.

--- In nbwr=

creaked
